extendedInfo.description: Introducing ShopRite from Home from your Android!  Now you can order your groceries from your phone. Only supports mobile phone devices, not Android tablets. With the newest ShopRite App for Android you can browse and purchase all your ShopRite grocery needs from your phone, and continue to use all the great tools to help you get things done at your ShopRite store; view weekly specials, create and edit your shopping list, clip coupons, view recipes â everything you expect from ShopRite.ShopRite from Home, Shop from your Phone, Shop from Anywhere:Start shopping on your desktop, and finish on your phone, or vise versa.Your ShopRite from Home lists and cart synchronize automatically from phone to desktop.Never ordered groceries before?Itâs easy and weâll even load your ShopRite in-store purchases for you, you just decide what to add to your cart.Same variety of items available in store, online and now Mobile!Running low on Shampoo?Scan barcodes from your pantry, fridge or bathroom to get real time pricing and add to your cart.Canât remember what you bought last week?No problem. View your past purchases and add them to your cart.Are you brand loyal or shopping by price?The filter button will be your new best friend.Donât like your bananas green?Add a note and let us know. Weâre shopping for you and youâre the boss.Choose a Pick up or Delivery time.Again, youâre the boss.Place your order quickly and easily.Save money by adding the most current Weekly Specials items to your list.The improved store locator maps out the closest ShopRite to where you are or your zip code.One tap adds Coupons your PricePlus card and your shopping list, no scissors required.Dinner panic? We have thousands of quick and easy recipes â add ingredients to your shopping list with one tap.Email your shopping list, and task someone else to do the shopping!The standard ShopRite Mobile App works with all ShopRite stores in Connecticut, Delaware, Maryland, New Jersey, New York & Pennsylvania.  ShopRite from Home services, including via Mobile, where available.

reviews.title: Used to Love it
reviews.comment: Ever since I updated this app I get, \"yikes, can\'t connect.\"  Yet, it is connecting what is that about? Please fix it.
reviews.author: Denise Cole

reviews.title: Coupons don\'t work
reviews.comment: Added coupons via my phone and they didn\'t apply at register.  Customer service said they have nothing to do with it.  Poor handling.
reviews.author: Mark T

reviews.title: Useful, but missing important info....
reviews.comment: I wanted to locate the nearest ShopRite pharmacy, but apparently this app does not list which ShopRite stores have pharmacies, which would be helpful.
reviews.author: Sean Twohig

reviews.title: Yikes could not connect
reviews.comment: This app was fantastic until the last update. Half of the coupons wont load onto my card. When you click it says, \"yikes could not connect\". I am not the only person who is receiving this error message either and it looks like people have been informing the makers for the last two weeks. App needs to be fixed immediately, as there are people losing money on valuable coupons that should be available.
reviews.author: Desiree Hargrove

reviews.title: Coupon issues
reviews.comment: Can\'t connect to coupons. Will try uninstalling and reinstalling. Will only try this once. Thought it would be good to have, so fast no so much.
reviews.author: Sharon Tichacek

reviews.title: Good gor shopping but....
reviews.comment: I used it last week for shopping worked great but now it won\'t let me clear my list! Extremely annoying please fix. I liked using this but if its never going to delete the things I didn\'t get or things already bought its totally useless!!!!
reviews.author: Erika Ennejjar

reviews.title: Needs to be fixed.
reviews.comment: Last update has messed this app up. None but two of the coupons I added to my card went to my shopping list. When I click on a coupon to view the description it defaults back to the View All category when I back out of the screen, which means I have to find the coupon again. I have some items in my cart that I can not remove. I get the \"yikes, could not connect\" error. Would REALLY love to see that fixed finally. Otherwise the app was great and has made saving money easier.
reviews.author: Brian Pavlik

reviews.title: YIKES!....   REALLY????????
reviews.comment: *I TRULY DESPISE THIS LAST UPDATE. I can not load my coupons. **YIKES CAN NOT CONNECT** **YIKES CAN NOT CONNECT** FIX THIS PROBLEM.... ASAP FIX THIS PROBLEM.... ASAP FIX THIS PROBLEM.... ASAP FIX THIS PROBLEM.... ASAP I\'m on a ridiculously tight budget, I count on every penny
reviews.author: Julie Serpa

reviews.title: Could not complete registration.
reviews.comment: Attempted to register but could not get beyond the registration form. When clicking the submit button it would state, \"Yikes! Could not connnect.\"
reviews.author: Christopher Roberts

reviews.title: Great app but needs to remove ads
reviews.comment: Seriously, it\'s a shopping app, Nooo need to advertise your own product but apart from that, the ads are blocking texts making it impossible to read. Remove the stupid ads.
reviews.author: shawn Kelly

reviews.title: Can\'t add coupons now.
reviews.comment: Updated this am and now I can\'t add coupons to my Price Plus card.  Says I am not connected,  but I am.
reviews.author: Scott Jaffee

reviews.title: So so
reviews.comment: Downloaded the app for the ease of adding coupons to my card but that feature won\'t work.
reviews.author: Amy Preston

reviews.title: Went to Shoprite today
reviews.comment: They had a huge ad everywhere about shop on phone, and guess what?  This program crashes if I tab on the dammed button.
reviews.author: SunYong Yi

reviews.title: Good idea, not so great execution
reviews.comment: Love the idea of the app, but coupons don\'t work. That\'s a killer for me.
reviews.author: Ruchi Patel

reviews.title: 4.5 Stars...
reviews.comment: Since I can\'t rate by a 1/2 star rating, ideally I\'d give this 4.5 stars.  I would\'ve given it 5 stars since they finally added the ShopRite From Home section to the app...BUT I\'ve noticed I can\'t add items I \"click\" on to one of my presorted shopping lists.  If I could it would be a full 5 stars.  In fact I have to admit, I enjoy ordering my groceries through the app, rather than the actual website, since now my tablet can basically function as an interactive grocery list that I can easily take out to the kitchen & take stock as to what\'s in my cupboards.  If they add a way to add items I search for on my tablet then I\'ll gladly give this 5 stars!
reviews.author: Michael Sinning

reviews.title: Yikes could not connect!
reviews.comment: I thought the app was wonderful at first until recently I thought it was just me that recieved the message above. It definitely isn\'t my phone I just got the new galaxy s4 and I had a crappy htc rezound before so there is no excuse. On top of everything there is no real \"customer service\" for this issue.  What a waste of an app!!
reviews.author: Angelia Santiago

reviews.title: Getting better
reviews.comment: I\'d like to see a price calculator that would automatically show the totals. It would be nice if it showed isle numbers for items in my shopping list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clear list....I\'d like to...
reviews.comment: No problems using the ecoupons, but the clear list function doesn\'t clear the ecoupons from the shopping list.
reviews.author: Tom Hackel

reviews.title: Yikes could not connect
reviews.comment: U cant click on all the coupons, half way and yikes could not connect!  Sad
reviews.author: damon pelicano

reviews.title: Shop rite
reviews.comment: Very nice luv
reviews.author: Gina Lops
